DOC.brief_summary: To compare incidence lymphocele lymphatic ascites patient use versus use FloSeal lymph node dissection
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Study FloSeal Prevention Lymphocele After Lymphadenectomy Gynecologic Cancer
DOC.criteria: Histologically confirm primary cancer uterine cervix , uterine corpus , ovary , fallopian tube FIGO stage Cervical cancer : FIOG stage IA2IIA2 Uterine cancer : FIGO stage IIII Ovarian fallopian tubal cancer : FIGO stage IIIIB Patients undergoing surgery include pelvic and/or paraaortic lymph node dissection Patients adequate bone marrow , renal hepatic function : WBC > 3,000 cells/mcl Platelets > 100,000/mcl Creatinine < 2.0 mg/dL Bilirubin < 1.5 x normal SGOT SGPT < 3 x normal American Society Anesthesiology Physical Status 01 Performance status ECOG 02 Patient must suitable candidate surgery Patients sign approve Informed Consent Patients history pelvic abdominal radiotherapy ; Patients pregnant Patients contraindication surgery ; Patients unfit Surgery : serious concomitant systemic disorder incompatible study ( discretion investigator ) ; Patient 's compliance geographic proximity allow adequate followup . Patients undergo lymph node sample
